Producer: Jana Edelbaum, Rachel Cohen, Robert Teitel
Production Co: Unified Pictures, State Street Pictures, Archer Gray, Floren Shieh Productions, Venture Forth
Synopsis: The sons (Skylan Brooks, Ethan Dizon) of two drug-addled hookers must fend for themselves after one's mother goes missing and the other (Jennifer Hudson) is arrested.
Title: The Inevitable Defeat of Mister & Pete
